solution_line_template: He added {initial_total_pounds}*{total_gain_percent}=<<{initial_total_pounds}*{total_gain_percent}={total_added_pounds}>>{total_added_pounds} pounds to his total
That means his new title is {initial_total_pounds}+{total_added_pounds}=<<{initial_total_pounds}+{total_added_pounds}={new_total_pounds}>>{new_total_pounds} pound total
His new body weight is {initial_bodyweight_pounds}+{bodyweight_gain_pounds}=<<{initial_bodyweight_pounds}+{bodyweight_gain_pounds}={new_bodyweight_pounds}>>{new_bodyweight_pounds} pounds
So he has {new_total_pounds}/{new_bodyweight_pounds}=<<{new_total_pounds}/{new_bodyweight_pounds}={lifting_to_bodyweight_ratio}>>{lifting_to_bodyweight_ratio} for his ratio
